import React from 'react'; import HowToPlaySubtitle from './HowToPlaySubtitle.js'; import { EventGoalCard } from '../../Footer/EventGoalCard.js'; import { MemberCard } from '../../Footer/MemberCard.js'; import { Users, HelpCircle, Gift, Repeat } from 'react-feather'; import '../../../css/about.css'; const Taboo = (props) => { return (

Step 1

Split into teams and pick a representative for your team.

Step 2

Each team representative takes one-minute turns drawing from the deck of Member Cards.

Step 3

Try to get your teammates to guess Member Cards without mentioning any of the following forbidden topics.

  • test
  • test
  • test

    • Step 4

    The team with the most amount of correct guesses wins! Repeat from Step 1 until bored.

    ); } export default Taboo;
